titlestmt.titleproper: George Ashby booklet, letters, and notes, 1770, 1774
titlestmt.author: David Hill

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by David Hill using EADitor ©2011

change.item: Imported into EADitor. Some normalization has occurred to apply EAD 2002 schema validation and conform to EADitor basic requirements.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: George Ashby booklet, letters, and notes
did.abstract: Booklet, letters and notes relating to George Ashby.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Contains an annotated copy of Ashby's booklet A Dissertation on a Singular Coin of Nerva (1772; printed 1774). A letter (1774) sent to Sir John Cullum (1733-1784) and signed "R.S." suggests that it was the letter-writer who wrote the annotations. Also includes a letter from Charles Gray (ca. 1695-1782), Member of Parliament for Colchester, that includes a drawing of a coin (1770), and a letter to Gray from Ashby (1770).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: George Ashby booklet, letters, and notes, 1770, 1774, Archives, American Numismatic Society.

userestrict.head: Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.
